text: The illuminated Our Lady of Lourdes Church in Tiruchi city on Saturday. The church as been celebrating the 10-day annual festival. The church, built with Gallo-Catholic design, from neo-Gothic spires to anguieshed scenes of crucifixion and martyrdom painted inside, contains icons of Virgin Mary garlanded in Hindu flower necklaces constructed in the year 1840 AD.— PHOTO: B. VELANKANNI RAJ
title: RIOT OF COLOUR
